entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
